Class Scania<T extends Loadable>

java.lang.Object
Scania<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Moveable
public class Scania<T extends Loadable> extends Object
Object class for constructing a Scania super with its specific features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Scania()
    Constructs a 300 horse-power, two-door, blue Scania with start position in (0, 0).

  • Method Details

    • raiseBed

      public void raiseBed(double deltaAngle)
      Raises the trucks loading bed a desired amount, caps out at 70 degrees.
      Parameters:
      deltaAngle - Takes in the angle difference that you want to bed with.

    • lowerBed

      public void lowerBed(double deltaAngle)
      Lowers the trucks loading bed a desired amount.
      Parameters:
      deltaAngle - Takes in the angle difference that you want to bed with.

    • gas

      public void gas(double amount)
      Increases the speed of the truck given that our loading bed is safely lowered to 0 degrees.
      Parameters:
      amount - Factor increasing the speed, must be in the interval [0,1].

    • brake

      public void brake(double amount)
      Slows down the car.
      Parameters:
      amount - Factor decreasing the speed, must be in the interval [0,1].
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when amount is outside the interval [0,1].
